LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot.label: Rice crafting spot
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot.description: Work place to process agricultural crops and by-products.
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot_Blueprint.label: Rice crafting spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot_Frame.label: Rice crafting spot (building)
LanguageData.RiceCraftingSpot_Frame.description: Work place to process agricultural crops and by-products.
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith.label: Smithy
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith.description: A smithy place where old-fashioned Japanese weapons and armor can be produced.
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith_Blueprint.label: Smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith_Frame.label: Smithy (building)
LanguageData.JPstyleBlacksmith_Frame.description: A smithy place where old-fashioned Japanese weapons and armor can be produced.
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace.label: Mud gathering spot
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace.description: \n(Installation location: mud, swamp, shallow, coastal flow) A place to gather mud for soil making.
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace_Blueprint.label: Mud gathering spot(blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace_Frame.label: Mud gathering spot(building)
LanguageData.ZP_MudCollectingPlace_Frame.description: \n(Installation location: mud, swamp, shallow, coastal flow) A place to gather mud for soil making.
LanguageData.PaddyField.label: 논
LanguageData.PaddyField.description: 논벼를 기르는 것이 가능한 논. 비옥도200%\n진흙,습지,얕은 물에서 밖에 설치불가능 하지만 풍부한 수분과 영양소가 있기에、범용형에 비교하면 고성능입니다.
LanguageData.PaddyField_Blueprint.label: 논 (blueprint)
LanguageData.PaddyField_Frame.label: 논 (building)
LanguageData.PaddyField_Frame.description: 논벼를 기르는 것이 가능한 논. 비옥도200%\n진흙,습지,얕은 물에서 밖에 설치불가능 하지만 풍부한 수분과 영양소가 있기에、범용형에 비교하면 고성능입니다.
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP.label: 논(범용형)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP.description: 논벼를 기르는 것이 가능한 논。비옥도140%。\n물 주변 이외에 설치가능.
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Blueprint.label: 논(범용형) (blueprint)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Frame.label: 논(범용형) (building)
LanguageData.PaddyField_GP_Frame.description: 논벼를 기르는 것이 가능한 논。비옥도140%。\n물 주변 이외에 설치가능.
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace.label: Earthworm gathering spot
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace.description: \nCapture earthworms for fish feeding and soil development.
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace_Frame.label: Earthworm gathering spot(building)
LanguageData.ZP_EarthwormCollectionPlace_Frame.descri: \nCapture earthworms for fish feeding and soil development.
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet.label: Farm fish net(3x3)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet.description:
(Installation location -> shallow, coastal flow, swamp, mud)
(feed -> earthworm, fish food, insect meat)
You can breed fish.
Be careful as it breaks and destroys the net when there is no food.
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Blueprint.label: Farm fish net(3x3) (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Frame.label: Farm fish net(3x3) (building)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Frame.description:
(Installation location -> shallow, coastal flow, swamp, mud)
(feed -> earthworm, fish food, insect meat)
You can breed fish.
Be careful as it breaks and destroys the net when there is no food.
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large.label: Large Farm fish net(4x5)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large.description:
(Installation location -> shallow, coastal flow, swamp, mud)
(feed -> earthworm, fish food, insect meat)
You can breed fish.
Be careful as it breaks and destroys the net when there is no food.
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large_Blueprint.label: Farm fish net(4x5) (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large_Frame.label: Farm fish net(4x5) (building)
LanguageData.ZP_AquacultureNet_Large_Frame.descriptio:
(Installation location -> shallow, coastal flow, swamp, mud)
(feed -> earthworm, fish food, insect meat)
You can breed fish.
Be careful as it breaks and destroys the net when there is no food.
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel.label: Floating solar light(need fuel)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel.description: (diameter:3)\nFuel type heat generating sun light that can be used for rice paddies and aquaculture net.\nSince it is a fuel type, the range is narrow and fuel efficiency is bad.
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel_Blueprint.label: Floating solar light(need fuel) (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel_Frame.label: Floating solar light(need fuel)(building)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Fuel_Frame.descriptio: (diameter:3)\nFuel type heat generating sun light that can be used for rice paddies and aquaculture net.\nSince it is a fuel type, the range is narrow and fuel efficiency is bad.
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp.label: Floating solar light
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp.description: Solar light which can be used for paddy fields and Farm fish net. It turns off automatically at night.
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Blueprint.label: Floating solar light(blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Frame.label: Floating solar light(building)
LanguageData.ZP_FloatingSunLamp_Frame.description: Solar light which can be used for paddy fields and Farm fish net. It turns off automatically at night.
